channel.title: Articles | A blog from a passionate geek
channel.description: A blog where I share "random" things from my past experience or my current journey. Hi, I'm a senior software developer engineer and a hobbyist music maker. I love researching and mixing technologies and tools to achieve my goals.

item.title: Building a blog: my first impressions (and some thoughts about Astro)
item.description: First experience building an actual static website, more specifically a blog, and first real use of Astro. This post shares my thoughts.
item.author: yannick.meine@gmail.com (Yannick Meine)
